mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FUNDING VALUES( FUNDING_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{fundingName},#{fundingCategory},#{fundingDetail}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{fundingEndDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), #{fundingSum},0,157,#{memberNo},1,0,FLOOR(TO_DATE(#{fundingEndDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')-SYSDATE),#{bizName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT FUNDING.FUNDING_NO AS fundingNo, FUNDING_NAME AS fundingName, FUNDING_CATEGORY AS fundingCategory, FUNDING_START_DATE AS fundingStartDate, FUNDING_END_DATE AS fundingEndDate, FUNDING_SUM AS fundingSum, FUNDING_CURRENT_SUM AS fundingCurrentSum, FUNDING_SUM_RATE AS fundingSumRate, MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, FUNDING_FILE_PATH AS fundingFilePath, FUNDING_DEADLINE AS fundingDeadline, BIZ_NAME AS bizName, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY FUNDING.FUNDING_NO ORDER BY FUNDING.FUNDING_NO) AS RN FROM FUNDING JOIN FUNDING_FILE ON FUNDING.FUNDING_NO = FUNDING_FILE.FUNDING_NO) WHERE RN=1 ORDER BY fundingNo DESC

SELECT FUNDING_NO AS fundingNo, FUNDING_NAME AS fundingName, FUNDING_DETAIL AS fundingDetail, FUNDING_END_DATE AS fundingEndDate, FUNDING_SUM AS fundingSum, FUNDING_CATEGORY AS fundingCategory, MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, FUNDING_CURRENT_SUM AS fundingCurrentSum, FUNDING_SUM_RATE AS fundingSumRate, FUNDING_END AS fundingEnd, FUNDING_DEADLINE AS fundingDeadline, BIZ_NAME AS bizName FROM FUNDING WHERE FUNDING_NO=#{fundingNo}
SELECT FUNDING_FILE_NO AS fundingFileNo, FUNDING_FILE_PATH AS fundingFilePath FROM FUNDING_FILE WHERE FUNDING_NO = #{fundingNo}

SELECT FUNDING_OPTION_PRICE_NO AS fundingOptionPriceNo, FUNDING_OPTION_LIST AS fundingOptionList, FUNDING_OPTION_PRICE AS fundingOptionPrice, FUNDING_NO AS fundingNo FROM FUNDING_OPTION_PRICE WHERE FUNDING_NO = #{fundingNo}
SELECT FUNDING_NO AS fundingNo, FUNDING_NAME AS fundingName, MEMBER_NO AS memberNo FROM FUNDING WHERE FUNDING_NO=#{fundingNo}

SELECT FUNDING_NO AS fundingNo, FUNDING_NAME AS fundingName, FUNDING_DETAIL AS fundingDetail, FUNDING_END_DATE AS fundingEndDate, FUNDING_SUM AS fundingSum, FUNDING_CATEGORY AS fundingCategory, MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, FUNDING_CURRENT_SUM AS fundingCurrentSum, FUNDING_SUM_RATE AS fundingSumRate, FUNDING_END AS fundingEnd, FUNDING_DEADLINE AS fundingDeadline, BIZ_NAME AS bizName FROM FUNDING WHERE FUNDING_NO=#{fundingNo} AND MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE FUNDING SET FUNDING_NAME = #{fundingName}, FUNDING_CATEGORY = #{fundingCategory}, FUNDING_DETAIL = #{fundingDetail}, FUNDING_END_DATE = TO_DATE(#{fundingEndDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), FUNDING_SUM = #{fundingSum}, FUNDING_DEADLINE = FLOOR(TO_DATE(#{fundingEndDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')-SYSDATE) WHERE FUNDING_NO=#{fundingNo}
mapper.select: SELECT FUNDING_OPTION_PRICE_NO FROM FUNDING_OPTION_PRICE WHERE FUNDING_NO = #{fundingNo}
SELECT FUNDING_FILE_NO FROM FUNDING_FILE WHERE FUNDING_NO = #{fundingNo}
